lead_paragraph: Federal regulators have reached a settlement with a New York brokerage firm and its executives to resolve accusations resulting from an investigation into Bernard L. Madoff's Ponzi scheme.
snippet: Federal regulators reached a settlement on Monday with a New York brokerage firm and its executives to resolve accusations resulting from an investigation into Bernard L. Madoff's Ponzi scheme.

headline.main: S.E.C. to Settle With Cohmad, a Firm Linked to Madoff

abstract: Federal regulators reached a settlement on Monday with a New York brokerage firm and its executives to resolve accusations resulting from an investigation into Bernard L. Madoff's Ponzi scheme.
